  Item 8.01.  Other Events.  
                             
On January 19, 2021, Wells Fargo & Company    
(the “Company”) issued a press release        
announcing that Wells Fargo Securities, LLC,  
an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of the    
Company, has commenced cash tender offers for 
certain outstanding debt securities of the    
Company. A copy of the press release is       
attached as Exhibit 99 and is incorporated    
herein by reference.
